search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for TrainHeroic (trainheroic.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for TrainHeroic can be found at: [https://www.trainheroic.com/pricing/](https://www.trainheroic.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Online Strength & Conditioning Software for Coaches - TrainHeroic

anytime * Stability: keep clients engaged & crush client turnover * Empowerment: the tools you need to run your business ![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) Build a anywhere, anytime * Stability: keep clients engaged & crush client turnover * Empowerment: the tools you need to run your business Solutions you need an experience your clients will love ========================================================= ![Image 8](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) Enjoy flexibility Coach in any context -------------------- 1 on 1 or groups. Remote, in-person, or hybrid. One tool, the info you need in one place. Make it yours Bring your brand to the forefront --------------------------------- From custom exercises to demo videos, make it yours! ![Image 9](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) ![Image 10](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) Save time Your custom library ------------------- Store exercises, circuits, programs, and prescriptions. Write them once, use ‘em forever in a single click. Get creative Powerful programming tools -------------------------- Program strength, conditioning, recovery, and everything in between. ![Image 11](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) ![Image 12](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) Keep them coming back Better client experience ------------------------ Keep your clients engaged with chat, leaderboards, and more.. Make more sales Sell your programs online ------------------------- Find new clients from anywhere in the world by selling in the TrainHeroic Marketplace. ![Image 13](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) [Start My Free Trial](https://account.trainheroic.com/create-account) Solutions you need an experience your clients will love ========================================================= ![Image 14](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Coach in any context 1 on 1 or groups. Remote, in-person, or hybrid. All the info you need in one place. ![Image 15](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Bring your brand to the forefront From custom exercises to demo videos, make it yours! ![Image 16](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Your custom library Store exercises, circuits, programs, and prescriptions. Write them once, use ‘em forever in a single click. ![Image 17](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Powerful programming tools Program strength, conditioning, recovery, and everything in between. ![Image 18](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Better client experience Keep your clients engaged with chat, leaderboards, and more.. ![Image 19](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Sell your programs online Find new clients from anywhere in the world by selling in the TrainHeroic Marketplace. [Start My Free Trial](https://account.trainheroic.com/create-account) More features to help you coach better ====================================== ![Image 20](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Teams and 1:1 Coach 1:1 or group clients into teams for easy program delivery and group communication ![Image 21](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Video review Easily review and provide feedback on videos sent by your client. Form review from a distance is a breeze! ![Image 22](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Sell your programs online Tap into the power of the TrainHeroic marketplace to sell your programs online. ![Image 23](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Customizable library Create and save your custom exercises, circuits, workouts, and full programs….or use ours to get started quick. ![Image 24](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Real-time chat Send messages, GIFs, reactions and more in real time. ![Image 25](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Client tracking Track compliance, progress, programming status and more from one powerful dashboard. ![Image 26](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Easy client onboarding Invite your clients with a click of a button. We’ll send them an email with simple instructions and automatically connect them to your profile. ![Image 27](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Powerful workout builder Build training sessions using exercises, circuits and plain text. Track multi-dimensional feedback on reps, sets, weight, time, distance, and many more! ![Image 28](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) #### Make it your own Add your logos, customize your exercise demo videos and more to make TrainHeroic feel like your own. [Start My Free Trial](https://account.trainheroic.com/create-account) Flexible pricing pay as you grow ================================== R #### Risk-Free 14-day trial R #### Sell your programs in the TrainHeroic Marketplace R #### Change Your Plan Anytime R #### Add Assistant Coaches for just $9.99 / month R #### Guided how-to content to get you started TRAINHEROIC PRICING =================== Grow on your terms. Pay only for what you need. 1 athlete 1 Athlete Up to 5 Up to 15 Up to 25 Up to 35 Up to 50 Up to 100 Up to 250 Up to 500 Up to 750 Up to 1000 $ 9.99 /MONTH [Start My Free Trial](https://account.trainheroic.com/create-account) No Credit Card Required ###### View all pricing plans

You bring the expertise, we’ll provide a spot =============================================== ### Coaches ### athletes ### countries Putting my own workouts on the app has improved my \[athletes’\] adherence. I won’t go back to the old pen and paper workout log for me or my athletes. Srochet Train Heroic has literally been a game changer for my business. The ability for me to separate myself with this app has actually blown my mind. JefLo75 “My workout is delivered to my phone, and I have a team of peer athletes and world class coaches at my fingertips while I’m working out. Well done! Definitely a game changer!” The Real Piepants [Read Customer Success Stories](https://www.trainheroic.com/customer-success/) Coaching Resources ================== 3 Steps to Get Started with TrainHeroic --------------------------------------- Create your programs, connect with clients, and get to coaching! We created [the Coach Playbook](https://www.trainheroic.com/coach-playbook/) to help you get started easily with TrainHeroic. It’s packed with helpful videos, pro tips, and all the guidance you need to crush it with TH. [Explore the Coach's Playbook](https://www.trainheroic.com/coach-playbook/) ![Image 29: A personal trainer helping her client do a pushup](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) Build Your Online Coaching Business ----------------------------------- Not ready to start yet? Read our Coach Business Guide. It is a step-by-step introduction to the world of online coaching. Written in collaboration with our best coaches, learn how to get your business off the ground and begin making money. [Explore the Business Guide](https://www.trainheroic.com/coach-business-guide/) Elevate Your Coaching Career ============================ Nobody likes worrying about client turnover. Upgrade to tools that help you keep them engaged and making progress. Sending your clients PDFs and Excel spreadsheets is the surest way to underdeliver — they expect the best from you. No other training software for coaches, personal trainers and gym owners gives the most comprehensive data, easy-to-use tools, and access to a world of new athletes through an online marketplace. TrainHeroic is THE software for personal trainers designed to help you keep the clients you have and find new ones. Our fast, user-friendly business management tools free up your time to coach at your pace with your schedule, locally or remote. Connect with your athletes, track their progress, improve your programs, and scale your business. Try TrainHeroic for free for 14 days. You’ll wonder how you ever did it without us. [Start My Free Trial](https://account.trainheroic.com/create-account) ![Image 30](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) Join the community Sign up for the latest training news and updates from TrainHeroic * [Follow](https://www.instagram.com/trainheroic/ "Follow on Instagram") * [Follow](https://www.youtube.com/c/TrainHeroic%20 "Follow on Youtube") * [Follow](https://www.facebook.com/trainheroic "Follow on Facebook") * [Follow](https://www.linkedin.com/company/trainheroic "Follow on LinkedIn") ![Image 31](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1) [![Image 32](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/trainheroic-strength-training/id955074569) [![Image 33](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)](https://play.google.com/store/search?q=train%20heroic&c=apps&hl=en_US&gl=US) For Athletes [Athlete Tools](https://www.trainheroic.com/athlete/) [TrainHeroic Marketplace](https://marketplace.trainheroic.com/?attrib=0-trainheroic) [Popular Programs](https://www.trainheroic.com/mp/) [TrainingLab Blog](https://www.trainheroic.com/blog) For Coaches [Coaching Tools](https://www.trainheroic.com/coach/) [Coach Business Guide](https://www.trainheroic.com/coach-business-guide/) [Getting Started Guide](https://www.trainheroic.com/coach-playbook/) [Customer Success Stories](https://www.trainheroic.com/customer-success/) Support [Merch](https://trainheroicgear.myshopify.com/) [Help Center](https://support.trainheroic.com/hc/en-us) [Feedback](https://peaksware.uservoice.com/forums/942745-trainheroic-customer-feedback) [Media Kit](https://www.trainheroic.com/pricing/media-kit/) [Careers](https://peaksware.com/careers/) [Webinars](https://www.trainheroic.com/webinars/) [Contact Us](mailto:support@trainheroic.com) Made with love, sweat, protein isolate and hard work in Denver, CO © 2023 TrainHeroic, Inc. All rights reserved. By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. Cookies Settings Reject All Accept All Cookies ![Image 34: TrainHeroic Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/71271544-afc6-4440-b3f4-c943f2a870d5/b8ea3fef-c8eb-4058-97af-38527680d178/2fbc0d83-cdb4-4759-9de0-e4dbd00adc39/TH_TrainHeroic_Black.png) Privacy Preference Center ------------------------- When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Allow All ### Manage Consent Preferences #### Functional Cookies Functional Cookies These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly. #### Performance Cookies Performance Cookies These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. These cookies help measure site statistics and analytics to improve performance and experience for customers. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. #### Advertisement and Marketing Cookies Advertisement and Marketing Cookies Sometimes referred to as Targeting Cookies. These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. #### Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Active These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. ### Cookie List Clear checkbox label label Apply Cancel Consent Leg.Interest checkbox label label checkbox label label checkbox label label Reject All Confirm My Choices [![Image 35: Powered by Onetrust](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/powered_by_logo.svg)](https://www.onetrust.com/products/cookie-consent/) With TrainHeroic, coaches can provide an elite level of service to their athletes using our strength & conditioning software.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on the number of athletes managed, with tiers scaling accordingly.

additional_fees.fee_description: Add assistant coaches for $9.99 per month.
